      Creates the discord instance with the desired features
      void IDiscordClient.changeAccountInfo(Optional<String> username, Optional<String> email, Optional<String> password, Optional<Image> avatar)
      Deprecated. 
      Use the split methods instead: IDiscordClient.changeUsername(String), IDiscordClient.changeEmail(String), IDiscordClient.changePassword(String), IDiscordClient.changeAvatar(Image).
      void IDiscordClient.changeAvatar(Image avatar)
      Changes this client's account's avatar.
      void IDiscordClient.changeEmail(String email)
      Changes this client's account's email.
      void IDiscordClient.changePassword(String password)
      Changes this client's account's password.
      void IDiscordClient.changeUsername(String username)
      Changes this client's account's username.
      IGuild IDiscordClient.createGuild(String name, IRegion region, Optional<Image> icon)
      Creates a new guild.
      IGuild IDiscordClient.createGuild(String name, String regionID, Optional<Image> icon)
      Deprecated. 
      Use IDiscordClient.createGuild(String, IRegion, Optional)
      static DiscordStatus.Maintenance[] DiscordStatus.getActiveMaintenances()
      Gets the active maintenance statuses.
      IPrivateChannel IDiscordClient.getOrCreatePMChannel(IUser user)
      Gets a PrivateChannel for the provided recipient.
      List<IRegion> IDiscordClient.getRegions()
      Gets the regions available for discord.
      static DiscordStatus.Maintenance[] DiscordStatus.getUpcomingMaintenances()
      Gets the upcoming maintenance statuses.
      void IDiscordClient.login()
      Logs the client in as the provided account.
      IDiscordClient ClientBuilder.login()
      Performs ClientBuilder.build() and logs in automatically
      void IDiscordClient.logout()
      Logs out the client.

      Methods in sx.blah.discord.handle.obj that throw DiscordException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IInvite.InviteResponse IInvite.accept()
      Accepts the invite and returns relevant information, such as the Guild ID and name, and the channel the invite was created from.
      void IMessage.acknowledge()
      Acknowledges a message and all others before it (marks it as "read").
      void IGuild.banUser(IUser user)
      Bans a user from this guild.
      void IGuild.banUser(IUser user, int deleteMessagesForDays)
      Bans a user from this guild.
      void IGuild.banUser(String userID)
      Deprecated. 
      Use IGuild.banUser(IUser)
      void IGuild.banUser(String userID, int deleteMessagesForDays)
      Deprecated. 
      Use IGuild.banUser(IUser, int)
      void IGuild.changeAFKChannel(Optional<IVoiceChannel> channel)
      Changes the AFK voice channel of the guild.
      void IGuild.changeAFKTimeout(int timeout)
      Changes the AFK timeout for the guild.

      Changes the color of the role.
      void IRole.changeHoist(boolean hoist)
      Changes whether to hoist the role.

      Changes the name of the guild.

      Changes the name of the role.

      Changes the name of the guild.

      Changes the name of the channel

      Changes the permissions of the role.

      Changes the region of the guild.

      Creates a new role in this guild.

      Creates a new voice channel.
      void IRole.delete()
      Attempts to delete this role.
      void IMessage.delete()
      Deletes the message.
      void IInvite.delete()
      Attempts to delete the invite this object represents.
      void IChannel.delete()
      Deletes this channel.
      void IGuild.deleteGuild()
      This deletes this guild if and only if you are its owner, otherwise it throws a MissingPermissionsException.
      void IGuild.deleteOrLeaveGuild()
      Deprecated. 
      See IGuild.deleteGuild() and IGuild.leaveGuild().
      IInvite.InviteResponse IInvite.details()
      Gains the same information as accepting, but doesn't actually accept the invite.
      void IRole.edit(Optional<Color> color, Optional<Boolean> hoist, Optional<String> name, Optional<EnumSet<Permissions>> permissions)
      Deprecated. 
      See IRole.changeColor(Color), IRole.changeHoist(boolean), IRole.changeName(String), IRole.changePermissions(EnumSet)
      void IVoiceChannel.edit(Optional<String> name, Optional<Integer> position)
      Deprecated. 
      Use IChannel.changeName(String) or IChannel.changePosition(int)
      void IChannel.edit(Optional<String> name, Optional<Integer> position, Optional<String> topic)
      Deprecated. 
      See IChannel.changeName(String), IChannel.changePosition(int), IChannel.changeTopic(String)
      void IGuild.edit(Optional<String> name, Optional<String> regionID, Optional<Image> icon, Optional<String> afkChannelID, Optional<Integer> afkTimeout)
      Deprecated. 
      See IGuild.changeName(String), IGuild.changeRegion(IRegion), IGuild.changeIcon(Optional), IGuild.changeAFKChannel(Optional), IGuild.changeAFKTimeout(int)
      IMessage IMessage.edit(String content)
      Edits the message.
      void IGuild.editUserRoles(IUser user, IRole[] roles)
      Edits the roles a user is a part of.
      void IGuild.editUserRoles(String userID, String[] roleIDs)
      Deprecated. 
      Use IGuild.editUserRoles(IUser, IRole[])
      List<IUser> IGuild.getBannedUsers()
      Retrieves the list of banned users from this guild.
      List<IInvite> IGuild.getInvites()
      This gets all the currently available invites for this guild.
      List<IInvite> IChannel.getInvites()
      This gets all the currently available invites for this channel.
      void IGuild.kickUser(IUser user)
      Kicks a user from the guild.
      void IGuild.kickUser(String userID)
      Deprecated. 
      Use IGuild.kickUser(IUser)
      void IGuild.leaveGuild()
      This leaves the guild, NOTE: it throws a DiscordException if you are the guilds owner, use IGuild.deleteGuild() instead!
      void IChannel.overrideRolePermissions(IRole role, EnumSet<Permissions> toAdd, EnumSet<Permissions> toRemove)
      Creates/edits permission overrides for this channel.

      Deprecated. 
      Use IChannel.overrideRolePermissions(IRole, EnumSet, EnumSet)

      Creates/edits permission overrides for this channel.

      Deprecated. 
      Use IChannel.overrideUserPermissions(IUser, EnumSet, EnumSet)
      void IGuild.pardonUser(String userID)
      This removes a ban on a user.
      void IChannel.removePermissionsOverride(IRole role)
      Removes a permissions override on this channel.
      void IChannel.removePermissionsOverride(IUser user)
      Removes a permissions override on this channel.
      void IChannel.removePermissionsOverride(String id)
      Deprecated. 
      Use either IChannel.removePermissionsOverride(IUser) or IChannel.removePermissionsOverride(IRole)
      void IGuild.reorderRoles(IRole... rolesInOrder)
      This reorders the position of the roles in this guild.
      void IMessage.reply(String content)
      Adds an "@mention," to the author of the referenced Message object before your content
      IMessage IChannel.sendFile(File file)
      Sends a file to the channel.
      IMessage IChannel.sendMessage(String content)
      Sends a message without tts to the desired channel.
      IMessage IChannel.sendMessage(String content, boolean tts)
      Sends a message to the desired channel.
      void IGuild.transferOwnership(IUser newOwner)
      Transfers the ownership of this guild to another user.
      void IGuild.transferOwnership(String newOwnerID)
      Deprecated. 
      Use IGuild.transferOwnership(IUser)

    • Uses of DiscordException in sx.blah.discord.util

      Methods in sx.blah.discord.util that throw DiscordException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IMessage MessageBuilder.build()
      Galactic law requires I have a build() method in my builder classes.
      String Requests.makeRequest(String url, org.apache.http.message.BasicNameValuePair... headers)
      Makes a request.
      String Requests.makeRequest(String url, org.apache.http.HttpEntity entity, org.apache.http.message.BasicNameValuePair... headers)
      Makes a request.
      IMessage MessageBuilder.send()
      Sends the message, does the same thing as MessageBuilder.build().
